query:
-- Contar purchases
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_purchases FROM purchases;

-- Contar campaigns
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_campaigns FROM campaigns;

-- Ver todas as purchases com seus campaigns
SELECT 
  p.id as purchase_id,
  p.customerEmail,
  p.campaignSlug,
  c.id as campaign_id,
  c.name as campaign_name
FROM purchases p
LEFT JOIN campaigns c ON p.campaignSlug = c.slug
ORDER BY p.id;
